segments.text: I see the kitchen filled with sunlight pouring through the open window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden looks so peaceful and well-kept, a stark contrast to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman stands there, blissfully polishing her plate, completely oblivious to the mess around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a pang of concern for the children who are about to invite disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is almost spilling off the counter now, a mini-waterfall cascading down onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will ever notice the puddle forming right beneath her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It seems like an accident waiting to happen, yet she just keeps on drying dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR
